comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly the newly elected speaker of the Texas House of Representatives. See El Paso herald., January 15, 1915, HOME EDITION, page 1, bottom of col 3. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn88084272/1915-01-15/ed-... If so, www.laits.utexas.edu/txp_media/html/leg/speakers/22.html is a brief bio. However, the name is likely to be so common, I don't have much confidence without another picture.
